response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This unique item holds immense value to us, but its true worth to you surpasses $1,500,000. We are offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,400,000. This is a limited-time offer designed to recognize your discerning taste and appreciation for exceptional quality.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this exclusive acquisition. We are confident that you will find the product to be a valuable addition to your collection or business.

Warm regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1400000}
